// reuse https://shadertoy.com/view/NdySD3

#define rot(a)   mat2(cos(a+vec4(0,11,33,0)))         // rotation
   
void mainImage(out vec4 O, vec2 U)
{
    float t=9., r,x,y,z,a=.4; 
    vec3  R = iResolution, d,
          D = normalize(vec3((U+U-R.xy)/R.y, -3.)),   // ray direction
          p = vec3(0,0,3), q,                         // marching point along ray 
          M = iMouse.z > 0. ? iMouse.xyz/R -.5: vec3(10,12,0)/1e2*cos(iTime+vec3(0,11,0))+vec3(0,.12,0); 

    for ( O=vec4(1); O.x > 0. && t > .005; O-=.005 )
        q = p,
        q.yz *= rot(.5-6.3*M.y),                      // rotations
        q.xz *= rot(-6.3*M.x),
        r = 1. + .004*sin( 25.*atan(q.z,q.y) ),       // unfair border
        x=q.x, y=q.y, z=q.z,
        d = vec3(  sqrt(y/a +z*z) , a*(x*x -z*z), sqrt(x*x -y/a) ), // X and Z just re-express Y(X,Z)
        d = abs( d - q ),                             // distance in each separated axes
        t = max( min(d.x, min(d.y,d.z) ),             // SDF
                 length(q.xz)-r ),                    // clamp to disk
        t = min(t,100.),                              // avoid visiting the infinity and its black hole :-) [ thanks mla ]
        p += .25*t*D;                                 // step forward = dist to obj
        
    if (O.a<0.) O  = texture(iChannel1, q );          // background
    else        O *= 1.2*vec4(1,.9,.6,1) * ( 1.-.5* texture(iChannel0, q.xz).r ), // material
                O += .5* max(0., dot( 2.*texture(iChannel2, q.xz ).rgb-1., D ) ); // glints
}
